Package Tools

Class PopulationStatus

java.lang.Object
Tools.PopulationStatus
public class PopulationStatus extends Object

Class PopulationStatus stores all the properties and information about the total population. What individuals and their distribution are present at each step of the simulation.

  • Constructor Details

    • PopulationStatus

      public PopulationStatus(int population, String filePath, double[] distribution, RuleSet rs, int placeInds, int initTumorsize, double fractionInvasiveCells) throws IOException

      Constructor for the PopulationStatus class

      Parameters:
      population - The total size of the initial population the simulation starts with.
      filePath - Location of the file containing the initial population configuration - optional value
      distribution - The total size of the initial distribution the simulation starts with.
      rs - The ruleset that the simulation is started with.
      placeInds - The location of the individual cells.
      initTumorsize - The initial size of the tumor that the simulation starts with.
      fractionInvasiveCells - The initial fraction of the cells that are invasice cell the simulation starts with.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception is thrown when file cannot be read from the file system.

    • updateDistribution

      public void updateDistribution()

      Updates the distribution of cell types across all sites. For each site, the number of cells of each type is counted and stored in an array. The distribution of cell types is then calculated and stored in a 2D array.

    • getIndividuals

      public ArrayList<Individual>[] getIndividuals()
      Getter function of all the individual cells of the population.
      Returns:
      all cells at all sites.

    • getIndividuals

      public ArrayList<Individual> getIndividuals(int site)
      Getter function to get all individuals for a specific site.
      Parameters:
      site - The site for which the individuals should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      List of individual cells.

    • getDistribution

      public double[][] getDistribution()
      Getter function for retrieving all the distributions at all sites.
      Returns:
      List of distributions.

    • getDistributionString

      public String getDistributionString()
      Getter function to get the distribution as a single String output.
      Returns:
      Concatenated String with all distributions.

    • updatePopulation

      public void updatePopulation(ArrayList<Individual>[] newCellsdAllSites, ArrayList<Individual>[] survivingCellsAllSites)
      Updates the population of cells for all sites, given the new and surviving cells.
      Parameters:
      newCellsdAllSites - An array of ArrayLists containing the new cells for each site.
      survivingCellsAllSites - An array of ArrayLists containing the surviving cells for each site.
